item.title: CV
item.description: Experience # Software Engineer 2022-08 - present Simbrella — Mobile Fintech Services Baku, Azerbaijan Fintech company that developes financial services for Financial Institutions, Mobile Wallets and MNOs to offer loans to massive segments of untapped customers. We provide digital and instant financial services and reduce cost of risk applying AI-based models to efficiently assess customers’ creditworthiness. Main contributor to development of internal End-to-End testing framework that reduced amount of deployment incidents and bugs by 80% saving over 40 thousands of dollars per quarter.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Team lead, Developer 2022-04 - 2022-02 Music2Notes (application) — Web app that transcribes songs to sheet music. Python, Librosa, Flask, React.js Team lead, Developer 2021-04 - 2021-06 Codenames Online (application) — Team Lead and Developer of the popular multiplayer board game with live rooms, chat system, and leaderboard. Express.js, React.js, Socket.io, CI/CD, Heroku Developer 2021-05 - 2021-06 Conway's Game of Life (application) — CLI and GUI (with SDL) for the evolutionary cellular automation devised by Mr.
